The color values of developed films in terms of L*, a*, and b* were measured using a colorimeter (Minolta, Tokyo, Japan). Films were placed in desiccators at 25°C and 53% RH prior to optical measurements (Sothornvit et al., 2009). A white reflector standard plate was used as background.
